subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After the Capitals whittled their three-goal deficit down to one, Henrik Lundqvist helped the Rangers hold on for a win at Verizon Center and force Game 7.
snippet: After the Capitals whittled their three-goal deficit down to one, Henrik Lundqvist helped the Rangers hold on for a win at Verizon Center and force Game 7.
